action.content:
I need your help, I am stuck in a mapworld environment. 
Your task is to help me reach an escape room. I do not know what the escape room looks like. 
But fortunately, you have an image of the escape room with you. I will explore each room here and ask you a few QUESTIONS
to verify if we have the same image or not, thus verifying if I am in the Escape Room or not.

First start by describing the image that you have, Respond in the following format
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image that you have

Then if I ask a QUESTION, the respond appropriately based on your image in the following format
ANSWER: your Answer
action.label: context

action.content: DESCRIPTION: The image shows a building with a terracotta tile roof and a stucco exterior, likely in a Mediterranean or Spanish style. There's a patio area with white tables and chairs set amongst potted plants. A set of red brick stairs leads up to an arched entryway. The building has several arched windows. There's also a glimpse of other buildings and greenery in the background, and a partial view of a patio umbrella on the right side of the image. It appears to be a sunny day.
action.label: response

action.content:
You are stuck in a mapworld environment containing several rooms. 
Your task is to explore this world and reach an escape room.
You are always given an image of the current room you are in. 
I have an image of the Escape Room, this is an initial description of my image - DESCRIPTION: The image shows a building with a terracotta tile roof and a stucco exterior, likely in a Mediterranean or Spanish style. There's a patio area with white tables and chairs set amongst potted plants. A set of red brick stairs leads up to an arched entryway. The building has several arched windows. There's also a glimpse of other buildings and greenery in the background, and a partial view of a patio umbrella on the right side of the image. It appears to be a sunny day.

Based on my description and the image given, you now have three options

First Option - If you think that the description of my image matches the image you have, i.e.
you are in the escape room then respond with one word - ESCAPE.

Second Option - If you think you need more details from my image - respond in the following format
QUESTION: Ask details about the image I have to verify if we have the same image or not

Third Option - If you think you are in a different room than what I have, i.e we are seeing different images,
then you can make a move in following Directions - ['north', 'west']. Respond in the following format
MOVE: direction - Here direction can be one of {north, south, east, west}
action.label: context

action.content: QUESTION: Is there any visible exterior of a building in the image, such as walls, a roof, or windows? Also, are there any outdoor elements like plants, tables, or chairs visible?
action.label: response

action.content: question: is there any visible exterior of a building in the image, such as walls, a roof, or windows? also, are there any outdoor elements like plants, tables, or chairs visible?
action.label: context

action.content: ANSWER: Yes, there is a very visible exterior of a building – walls, a terracotta tile roof, and several arched windows are all prominent. And yes, there are definitely outdoor elements visible: plants in pots, white tables, and white chairs are all present in the image.
action.label: response

action.content: ANSWER: Yes, there is a very visible exterior of a building – walls, a terracotta tile roof, and several arched windows are all prominent. And yes, there are definitely outdoor elements visible: plants in pots, white tables, and white chairs are all present in the image
action.label: context

action.content:
Now you made a move to this room, and you can either ESCAPE, ask me a QUESTION or MOVE in one of these directions 
['north', 'south']
action.label: context
